类 DeclareHCPAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc.itrust.action.DeclareHCPAction

  • public class DeclareHCPAction
extends java.lang.Object
    Used by the patient to declare HCPs as "designated", in editHCPs.jsp.
    作者:
    Andy Meneely

      • DeclareHCPAction

        public DeclareHCPAction(DAOFactory factory,
                long loggedInMID)
        Sets up defaults
        参数:
        factory - The DAO factory to be used for generating the DAOs for this action.
        loggedInMID - This patient

    • 方法详细资料

      • getDeclaredHCPS

        public java.util.List<PersonnelBean> getDeclaredHCPS()
                                              throws iTrustException
        Lists the declared HCPs for this current patient
        返回:
        Returns a list of the declared HCPs
        抛出:
        iTrustException

      • declareHCP

        public java.lang.String declareHCP(java.lang.String hcpStr)
                            throws iTrustException
        Validate an HCP's MID and declare them, if possible
        参数:
        hcpStr - The MID of an HCP to declare
        返回:
        A status message,
        抛出:
        iTrustException
